name: ChaChaPolyHelper
description: Simple encapsulation library for [Crypto](https://github.com/rweather/arduinolibs/tree/master/libraries/Crypto) library, used for encrypting and decrypting with ChaCha20 and Poly1305 algorithms.
keywords: chacha, poly, chacha20, poly1305, cipher, encrypt, decrypt, decipher, security, aead, hash, mac
